thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 74 of 625
thread.title: Shayla Harrington

author: Shayla Harrington
title: Shayla Harrington
text: I love the fit, fabrics, and colors of most everything that I have purchased from Fabletics. My major objection to the VIP service is that I cannot use credits for sale-priced items, which is the reason that I will be leaving my VIP status behind after this order. It's not like they gave that money to me, they took it out of my account when I forgot to skip a month, so I should be able to spend it however I want.
